title: Honour Rek'sai for being the only League mom.
body: Honour {{champion:421}} for working through the toughest of days, even without pay. Do us a favour and disable the Xer'sai mom today Rito, she needs the day off.

replies.body:
but what about some love  for {{champion:60}}  and her baby lings :c

http://pre08.deviantart.net/7e0a/th/pre/i/2013/099/2/0/elise__the_knitting_queen_by_wuki-d5z34sk.png

> [{quoted}](name=Azteryz,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=oTFkKia7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-08T16:25:44.047+0000)
>
> but what about some love  for {{champion:60}}  and her baby lings :c
> 
> http://pre08.deviantart.net/7e0a/th/pre/i/2013/099/2/0/elise__the_knitting_queen_by_wuki-d5z34sk.png

she doesn't shed a tear when her babies get killed and she is fine with her babies tanking damage

^this. I was about to make a post about this.
She is the only confirmed mother in LoL and does not give a shit about her spawn.

WTF RITO

Most spider species just care for the young till they hatch. I would assume Elise got that trait which is why she doesn't care as much about her babies dying lol. Still good enough to make her a mama to be praised in my book :)
Most spider die upon giving birth... and the babies "fly" away with the web ballooning technique .

Hey... wait a moment. You obviously only watched that movie called Charlotte's Web. That's only one type of spider, and only happens to a few spiders. Some spiders eat their hatchlings, or they just leave them. They also eat their mates sometimes after they reproduce.

But there is also a species of spider where the mother sacrifice herself so the babies could eat her corpse as their first meal,  Coelotes is the name, it's kind of sad. Also many big, Tarantula like, spiders die shortly after laying eggs. Speaking of spider that fly, did you know that they (once again) discover a species of spider that have wings? I think that's a good concept for a skin {{champion:60}}
{{champion:412}} BRING ME THE MOMS!!! I'LL PUT THEM NEXT TO THE WIVES!!!!!!
When you post somewhere else to recuperate from the downvotes you got by arguing about the Lottery pick in one-for-all.

Kassadin is the very first league mom tho.
But i think his daughter is dead or smth
ITT: People don't know how genders work.
gender is a social construct and doesnt have to be based off biological sex
kassadin is a male cannot be a mother.  please keep your beliefs out of a VIDEO GAME.

"Just because this is an avocado doesn't mean it can't make apple juice."

Now change some of those nouns. :^)

> [{quoted}](name=Billy VoHagen,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=oTFkKia7,comment-id=00030001000000020000,timestamp=2016-05-08T20:02:50.077+0000)
>
> "Just because this is an avocado doesn't mean it can't make apple juice."
> 
> Now change some of those nouns. :^)

<3

thing is, the lore stats male. therefore he is a male. he cannot give birth therefore not a mother, if anything he would be a father figure. if we fully consider it, the only one that can give "birth" is malzahar as he spawns voidlings, however we have to consider the fact that voidlings may already exist in the void so hes just summoning them instead of birthing them. 

kassadin has no lore where he is a father, nor has children of any kind.  just because you wish to bring your beliefs here doesnt mean you should.

while i do belief in equal rights for everyone who wishes to change their body types (several of my friends for example) this game is not the place for it.

people have this stupid belief that even though you are definitely male or female you can be either one. its because people have had a shit time learning why things need solid definitions, and they are slowly degrading the value of our language. ignore them if you will.
have my upvote

so much hate from people that just cannot accept the fact that a cis male character in a VIDEO GAME cannot be female because they are white knights of the internet...its like how people are terrified of making jokes towards people they know are trans, i know from personal experience that the ones that are not doing it for attention HATE talking about it and will gladly joke about it.
this was just a joke right

Transgenders. And before you ask about reproduction: some couples, particularly transgender couples, sometimes have a kid before they go through genital reconstruction surgery (sorry if I called it wrong >.<) although it is extremely uncomfortable and feels highly unnatural to the couple. Most, however, tend to adopt. :3
Because in a place like Shurima, genetic reconstruction is very common......................
They say Renekton was a girl before the Ascension. Sexual Ascension, that is.
But what of Ren's sister, Susan?

I heard she was a bitch. Lol. Get it? Because Nasus is a do--

Ill show myself out now.

I just meant that "gender is a social construct and doesnt have to be based off biological sex" is a phrase that transgenders use. Don't hate me for it. Ask any trans and this is what he or she will say. I am not saying I agree with the statement that Kass is a girl (trust me, I really really don't), I just simply mean to state that the description of gender is extremely appropriate. Otherwise, how do you explain trans people? 

(I hope to god that you are not someone who plans to be wicked offensive to trans people.)
This ain't Tumblr...

THANK YOU!!!!!!  Good God people, this whole thread was meant to be a joke, to evoke laughter or chuckles, not spark a debate over genders!  I mean COME ON GUYS, this is just a video game!!!  Don't bring in topics that have nothing to do with the thread or the game!  Trust me guys, I don't have anything against the transgender community or anything like that.  But there is a time and place for discussions like that, and a joke thread is neither of those things.

Well i don't know about you but...

> Sexual ascension

...kinda got me chuckling.

This is wrong on so many levels. It's not like you have the slightest need to understand the principles at work, because it doesn't matter to you anyway, but that doesn't mean you get to take your grossly oversimplified children's stories about how the world is supposed to work and impose them on people who don't have any choice but to know better. Calling people "mentally broken" because you don't understand them is bullshit.
what did he say?
You can tell it was horrible because Riot took it off the boards. People these days. Riot should leave the comment so we can flame the flamer.
Okay. Sorry! I have a couple trans friends and they never seemed offended by the word >.<

He does have a point, there's a difference between sex (biological) and gender (assignment)

But, it's League of Legends, and there hasn't been any LGBT champs that I know of (unless you count {{champion:44}}). And I'm 99.8% sure Kassadin identifies as male.
"identifies". Lol. Also male and female are the names of the biological sexes.

Alright then.

ITT: People don't know how biological sexes work.
http://m.imgur.com/96Q75HG

Why, do you disagree with him?
(of course, this is not the place where I'd choose to have this discussion)
Let's just not get into that here.
I hate your comment and find it adorable.
And she keeps that glorious figure despite having hundreds of kids.
well rek'sai wasn't in MSI so I guess that is her day  off
